package main
import "math"
// Coordinate ç·¯åº¦çµŒåº¦
type Coordinate struct {
Longitude float64
Latitude float64
}
// EarthRadius èµ¤é“åŠå¾„
const EarthRadius = 6378140
// DistanceOnTheEarth åœ°çƒä¸Šã® 2 ç‚¹é–“ã®è·é›¢ã‚’å‡ºã™ï¼ˆçƒé¢ä¸‰è§’æ³•ï¼‰
func DistanceOnTheEarth(from, to Coordinate) float64 {
fromLadLon := from.Longitude * math.Pi / 180
fromLadLat := from.Latitude * math.Pi / 180
toLadLon := to.Longitude * math.Pi / 180
toLadLat := to.Latitude * math.Pi / 180
alpha := math.Sin(fromLadLat)*math.Sin(toLadLat) +
math.Cos(fromLadLat)*math.Cos(toLadLat)*math.Cos(fromLadLon-toLadLon)
arcAlpha := math.Acos(alpha)
return arcAlpha * EarthRadius / 1000
}

package main
import (
"fmt"
"time"
"github.com/uh-zz/traning/algorithm/shuffle"
)
func main() {
// ãƒ©ãƒ³ãƒ€ãƒ ãªè¦ç´  n å€‹ã®ã‚¹ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚¹å–å¾—
input := shuffle.RandomIntList(n)
inputLength := len(input)
// ãƒãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚½ãƒ¼ãƒˆ
MergeSort(&input, 0, inputLength)
}
// MergeSort ãƒãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚½ãƒ¼ãƒˆ
func MergeSort(input \*[]int, left, right int) {
// è¦ç´ æ•°1ã¤ã®å ´åˆã¯æŠœã‘ã‚‹
if right-left == 1 {
return
}
// é…åˆ—ã‚’ï¼’ã¤ã«åˆ†ã‘ã‚‹ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒ‡ãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¹
middle := left + (right-left)/2
// é…åˆ—å·¦å´
MergeSort(input, left, middle)
// é…åˆ—å³å´
MergeSort(input, middle, right)
var buffer []int
// å·¦å´ã¨å³å´ã‚’ãƒãƒƒãƒ•ã‚¡ã«ãŸã‚ã‚‹ï¼ˆå³å´åè»¢ï¼‰
for index := left; index < middle; index++ {
buffer = append(buffer, (*input)[index])
}
for index := right - 1; index >= middle; index-- {
buffer = append(buffer, (*input)[index])
}
// ãƒãƒ¼ã‚¸ã™ã‚‹
scopeLeft := 0
scopeRight := len(buffer) - 1
for index := left; index < right; index++ {
if buffer[scopeLeft] <= buffer[scopeRight] {
// å·¦å´æ¡ç”¨
(*input)[index] = buffer[scopeLeft]
scopeLeft++
} else {
// å³å´æ¡ç”¨
(*input)[index] = buffer[scopeRight]
scopeRight--
}
}
}
